conclusion: Problem involves shadows cast by objects on a wooden floor.
Three objects: birdcage, helmet, drumstick casting shadows A, B, C.
Light source is above objects and moves to the right.
Need to determine changes in position and size of shadows.
Shadows are formed when an object blocks light, creating a dark area behind it.
Position and size of shadow depend on position of light source and object.
Shadows move and change size when light source moves.
Light source moving to the right affects shadow movement.
If light source moves to the right, shadow moves to the left.
Shadow A should move to the left and possibly become longer.
Shadows B and C should also move towards the left.
